inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically confirmed non-small cell lung cancer (NCSLC)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Surgery within 4 weeks prior to study registration
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known active central nervous system (CNS) metastases and/or carcinomatous meningitis
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice, which may require phototherapy. The patient's age and condition do not meet the inclusion criteria for this trial.
